nodes.text: The Nawataa waterfall was a waterfall formed by the Chenataa river in the Kkowir Forest on the planet Kashyyyk. Hidden behind the waterfall lay the entrance to the Webweaver caverns.

The Nawataa Waterfall first appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
